title: Niall Horan says Harry Styles is made for the big screen
text:
Radio 1 listener Zach really opened a can of worms on Breakfast with Greg James when he unleashed his Unpopular Opinion that "professional singers are NOT good at acting".

The feature is called Unpopular Opinion after all – where listeners and special guests get a controversial opinion off their chest – but when Niall Horan was in the studio, we all had a hunch what Zach was getting at.

When Greg asked Zach who "the main offenders" were, he hit back with Harry Styles' acting debut in 2017 film Dunkirk, but as Niall pointed out: "You don’t get into a [Christopher] Nolan movie for no reason".
description: “You don’t get into a Christopher Nolan movie for no reason”
